description:

#ps5 #ps5games #MK1 #MortalKombat #DefinitiveEdition

title: Mortal Kombat 1: Definitive Edition - Ghostface x Shang Tsung Trailer | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
The 2025 season is now on its last legs, and the last battle before the World Final is about to take place in Los Angeles, California, which is hosting a GT live event for the very first time. 

Last round in Berlin, Jose Serrano of Spain came out victorious in a difficult race in the rain. This was a consecutive victory for him continuing from the London event, giving him a good amount of World Series points that will help him towards a possible first overall victory in the Nations Cup.
But his rivals are not just going to stand by and let that happen. To turn the tables in the 2025 season, to stand on the podium themselves, they will go all out to take down Serrano at every opportunity they get.

Will Serrano shake off their pursuit and solidify his position even further? Or will his top rivals grab victory for themselves and even the score? See and find out who the goddess of victory will smile upon in the final live round of the season!

A separate Live Timing stream where viewers
title: GT World Series 2025 | Round 3 - Los Angeles | Nations Cup [English]

author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10010853

Get a brand-new look at PlayStation VR2 gameplay of Thief VR: Legacy of Shadow in this new video. See Magpie in action as you sneak past guards, take down enemies with your blackjack, pickpocket and lockpick with precision, use a variety of specialized arrows, and uncover hidden secrets with glyph vision, all in immersive VR on PlayStation VR2.

Brought to you by Vertigo Games, the award-winning creators of Metro Awakening and Arizona Sunshine, and Maze Theory, in close collaboration with Eidos-Montréal, Thief VR: Legacy of Shadow marks the long-awaited return of the legendary Thief franchise.

Thief VR: Legacy of Shadow is coming December 4, 2025 to PlayStation VR2. 

#ps5 #psvr2 #psvr2games
title: Thief VR: Legacy of Shadow - Gameplay #2 Trailer | PS VR2 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
The GT World Series rounds are held in locations around the globe leading up to the World Final. The stage for Round 3 this year comes to Los Angeles, California for the very first time.

So far Subaru has won 2 live event rounds in a row even though their car is said to be underwhelming in performance. All eyes are on Subaru to see whether they can pull off a 3rd victory and enter the World Finals with a maximum amount of World Series points.
Meanwhile a pack of strong manufacturers follow close behind, chasing Subaru with relentless determination so that they too can start in the World Final in the best position possible. 

In the Manufacturer cup, a team of 3 drivers fights though the season, each responsible for one of the races. The competitors who will represent the team in this last round before the World Final are competitors who have risen at the top of the online qualifiers in the North/South Americas region. 

Will Subaru achieve a 3rd consecutive live event win for the fir
title: GT World Series 2025 | Round 3 - Los Angeles | Manufacturers Cup [English]

author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/concept/10015727

Frenetic roguelike shooter Sweet Surrender is out now on PlayStation VR2 ! 

Fight your way to the top of a dystopian Megatower using guns, grenades, swords, snipers, and everything else at your disposal in frenetic VR shooter Sweet Surrender.

Engage in agile combat, running, teleporting or even ziplining across the battleground in perfect comfort. Pick from a wide variety of firearms and melee weapons, and use overpowered upgrades to turn yourself into a customized combat machine – from electromagnetic blasts to even slowing down time. No two runs are the same: as you fight you’ll discover shortcuts and hidden levels, and unlock new classes that change your playstyle. 

Features:
- PlayStation VR2 exclusives: Adaptive Triggers, Haptic Feedback & 90fps visuals.
- Endless combat: Choose from a huge range of guns and melee weapons.
- Collectable upgrades: Use upgrade chips to customize and refine your build.
- Buttery smooth mobility: Gra
title: Sweet Surrender - Launch Trailer | PS VR2 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/concept/10017135

Wishlist Now for PS5: https://store.playstation.com/concept/10017135

The Witch's Bakery is a cozy Adventure RPG about a joyful witch who opens her bakery in modern Paris. She has one special power: she can see into people's hearts and heal emotions through magic!

You play as Lunne, who has just arrived in the city! Each day is split into three phases:
Daytime, where Lunne manages her bakery and serves clients with her team of friends.
Evening, where Lunne explores Paris, builds relationships, discovers the city's secrets and goes inside her friends' troubled heart.

Night, where Lunne rests, improves her magic, decorates her bakery and spends time in her cosy atelier.

The story progresses through the days as you earn experience, money, and fame, meet new friends and heal their heart.

#ps5 #ps5games
title: The Witch's Bakery - Announcement Trailer | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/en-us/product/EP4295-PPSA30490_00-AOBABYLONPS500EU

Dive into an epic, brand-new adventure with Asterix & Obelix - Mission Babylon, now available on PS5!

This time, our favorite Gauls leave their beloved village for a long journey through the Parthian Empire, a faraway kingdom under threat from Roman invasion. Their mission? To save Monipehni, the King of the Parthians, who has fallen victim to a deadly poison brewed by Bahmbuhzeli, a treacherous sorcerer allied with Caesar.

Along the way, they will need to gather the ingredients for the antidote while fending off fierce Roman legionaries. They will also lend a hand to local villagers in exotic and enchanting landscapes.

Thanks to their courage, their legendary resourcefulness and plenty of wellplaced slaps, Asterix and Obelix will push back the invaders and prove that the indomitable Gauls are unbeatable, no matter how far from home they may be!

Experience a story full of humor, epic battles and unfo
title: Asterix & Obelix - Mission Babylon - Launch Trailer | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://www.playstation.com/en-us/games/demon-slayer-kimetsu-no-yaiba-the-hinokami-chronicles-2/

Kaigaku, the Upper Rank demon featured in Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba Infinity Castle, is now available as DLC!
Buy his character pack now to use him in VS Mode, or buy the "Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba Infinity Castle" Character Pass to get him plus 6 other packs to be added in the coming months.
 
Also now available is the Anime Songs & BGM Pack! This new DLC allows players to change the background music that plays during battles in VS Mode to the different tracks featured in the anime Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba. This includes TV versions of the opening songs!

#ps5 #ps5games #ps4 #ps4games #demonslayerkimetsunoyaiba
title: Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba - Infinity Castle Character Pass - Kaigaku Trailer | PS5 & PS4 Games
